record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 6384
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 6384 -- (House of Representatives - September 15, 2008)

[Page: H8097]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that my name be removed as a cosponsor of H.R. 6384.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Nevada?
